form.emailMax: Email must be less than 160 characters
form.emailMin: Email must be at least 6 characters long
form.passwordMax: Password must be less than 160 characters
form.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters long
form.confirmPasswordMax: Confirm password must be less than 160 characters
form.confirmPasswordMin: Confirm password must be at least 6 characters long
form.confirmPasswordWhitespace: Confirm password cannot be only whitespace
form.confirmPasswordNotMatch: Confirm password does not match password
